page.title: 20HEALTH CARE AND EDUCATION
page.content:
Residents are served by general practitioners from Market Bosworth. For maternity care they would be assigned to either Nuneaton or Leicester and for general hospital care to Leicester or Hinckley. Convalescence and rehabilitation facilities are available at Bosworth Park Infirmary. The nearest dentist or chiropodist is at Hinckley, and the nearest optician at Market Bosworth. Children from the area attend Market Bosworth Primary or Middle Schools and Bosworth College, Desford.
